Thank you, Master mcminutes, for your wisdom.

Another advice from me is. “The people who are very ambitious, too ambitious in fact, taking a giant leap to the high-level and experienced needed profession or act and yet those who are lacking wisdoms will be blind for their actions by their very ambitious behaviour and by that, their view will trip down, into your through the ankles eventually like a pantaloon or a woman's baggy trousers, making a rough bouncy moments of thought decision to get out of stress and eventually to the rough path into a deep suffering state, and your body eventually will trip as well without the mentality and the view making your body decay as it lays there” This is my final message from here, Good luck with life

Failures are good, motivations they are, they are good because they are the same and you are ready to face off what you are heading with and taking opportunity to get, like learning from them, pain and suffering being gone is never the true happiness we will get without them, completing after many attempts gives you a sense of relief and it makes you happy. A perfect life isn't everything perfect, it's everything when you have already something you need, done everything you want, goals completed, there is limit to pain, but those found purpose in life can withstand almost anything, the pain but the desire to face them and learn from the attempts and mistakes with desire tool, will certainly guide you. It's called, Bring. Yourself. Some. Faith.  - - Philosopher Minutes

Ludwig Van Beethoven, in his former state, he was an outstanding musician, pianist and composer, he was incredibly but a tragic hit, he was deaf in his late times, but he had perfect pitch, that way he had pipes that will vibrate and give off different notes to make melodies, hence making him able to do more compositional pieces, his late compositions were even better than his early one, because he never gave up and found solutions to everything, failures are important because Beethoven learned from them to make a perfect solution to his problem, Edison had failed 10 thousand times but manage to invent greater inventions because he had great desire, he then took every opportunity, even learning from his mistakes, never afraid to face obstacles but also analyse them, he never gave up,
Never. Give. Up, just like here, if you stop, you will stop, if you go, you will go closer

This is somehow the act of loyalty, here is a little advice, you will never get what you want, goals, needs, success when you are not putting much effort into it, stopping and looking back is way of giving up and if you look back, there is nothing there, a great desire,soo great is when you aree guaranteed to get it, you will get it, Thomas Edison partner, in former state he wanted to be a partner of Edison, he did because the desire was so great, he have felt the need to overcome the obstacles because he is not afraid and has done everything he's best to get it and he did, because he face the challenges and never gave up.
